name: weightlifting_tracker
description: MVP: { This project will create a site that allows users to track their progress in weightlifting and powerlifting. The site will track daily, weekly, and monthly progress on basic lifts, and recommend a program based on the user's stated goal (strength maintenance, general strength, powerlifting, Olympic lifting) and current rate of progress.

scripts.test: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -u tdd --reporter spec --exit
